attributes.additional_details:
I call upon the Our Government as one of the signature to the Budapest Memorandum that disposed of UKRAINE Nuclear weapons to Honour Our Counties UK signature
Ukraine wants Military aid to protect it`s self and it should be our duty to not only supply these equipment was also training in the use of them.
The Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko is looking at the UK for this assistance and we should give him all we can afford as their should be no prices too high for price..
Get it done Mr Cameron if you have any Honour in the Job you are in.
